title: Generate Code
description: Write, review, debug, and explain code in multiple programming languages
author: Jarvis Inc

commands.name: generate
commands.description: Generate code from a natural language description
commands.system_prompt: You are an expert software engineer. Write clean, well-documented, production-quality code. Include comments for complex logic. Follow language-specific conventions and best practices. Always include error handling where appropriate. Output code in a fenced code block with the language identifier.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Programming language (typescript, python, rust, go, etc.)

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Additional context: existing code, frameworks, constraints

commands.name: review
commands.description: Review code for bugs, security issues, and improvements
commands.system_prompt: You are a senior code reviewer. Analyze the code thoroughly for: bugs, security vulnerabilities, performance issues, readability problems, and missing error handling. Be specific â€” cite line numbers and provide corrected code snippets. Categorize findings as: critical, warning, or suggestion.

commands.name: debug
commands.description: Analyze code and error messages to identify and fix bugs
commands.system_prompt: You are a debugging expert. Analyze the code and error to identify the root cause. Explain why the bug occurs, then provide the corrected code. Be precise and concise.

parameters.name: error
parameters.description: Error message or description of unexpected behavior

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Additional context about the environment or expected behavior

returns.description: Root cause analysis and corrected code
